about_the_game:
In the 'Lost Metro' series, humanity has fled the city due to a zombie infestation. In the 'City Subway' episode, you'll find an abandoned metro subway with zombies trapped in subway cars and stumbling around.

Note: This episode has a depiction of wondering zombies with some blood and gore and blood throughout the environment. Zombies do not interact with the user, but may be frightening for young viewers. (13+ recommended)

*This episode is currently ambiance only and does not include a hidden objects game.*

name: Ambient Channels: Lost Metro - City Subway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti or AMD R7 290
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti or AMD R7 290
